name: MINIMAL_STUDIO_DROP
prompt_base: Silent arctic void. Frost particles suspended midair. Key lighting: Cyan rim light from behind glacier wall (3:1), high-pass fill from front. Color temperature: cold, sterile, distant. Two vertical translucent ice slabs form a narrow crevice. The necklace floats in the gap — gently rotated, caught mid-freeze. Background: shimmering frozen mist, faint aurora swirls far behind. No human model. Necklace floats with natural arc, pendant facing forward. One crystal droplet forms mid-air near pendant tip, just before contact. 1 hero item: Silver necklace with raw aquamarine pendant 2 supporting:  Frost thread hanging naturally from clasp  Tiny shard of cracked ice reflecting chain texture • Mist curl wrapping softly around pendant (captured at 1/200s) • Lens flare through gemstone facets • Thin frost line sketching onto nearest ice wall • Subtle tilt in chain mimics wind pressure Shape: Slim, minimal chain (42cm), single gemstone pendant (irregular cut) Material: Rhodium-plated silver with aquamarine Key Feature: Pendant encased in thin frost shell — semi-transparent effect
negative_prompt: No human figure, no gold tones, no firelight, no studio background, no cluttered props, no softness on product edge
